title: Week 4 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 9/27)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. for Week 4 gambling advice, covering all 14 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Pats-Bills (6:10), Jags-Broncos (10:50), Browns-Ravens (14:45), Chiefs-Lions (19:05), Bucs-Rams (25:35), Cowboys-Saints (30:55), Raiders-Colts (34:30), Redskins-Giants (40:25), Panthers-Texans (44:40), Chargers-Dolphins (47:30), Titans-Falcons (52:05), Seahawks-Cardinals (53:30), Vikings-Bears (55:55) and Bengals-Steelers (58:40). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
